numlitem.para: Main Deck Shutoff Valves are verified to be operative before each flight,
Pack Dump Valves are verified to be operative before each flight, and
Forward lower lobe cargo A/C FLOW RATE is not selected.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Observe LIMITATIONS/PERFORMANCE PENALTIES.
Carriage of animals and perishables is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Lower Lobe Cargo Cond Air Flow Rate selector "FWD INOP - OFF". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Position the Overhead Maintenance panel (P461) LOWER LOBE CARGO COND AIR FLOW RATE SELECTOR to AFT LOW or AFT HIGH or OFF.
Verify Main deck Shut Off Valves (M/C SOVs) and Pack Dump Valves are operative by performing the following steps:
Ensure the Cargo Fire Main Deck Arm Switch is not ARMED.
Position the Bleed Air Control panel (P5) PACK 1 selector to NORM and Pack 2 and 3 Selectors to OFF.
Access Pack 1 flow Control Valve through the air conditioning equipment bay access doors and disconnect connector DV93 from the valve (V93).
Access L – MAIN EQPT/E1-1 THROUGH E1-6 disconnect panel number AE 0411 (STA 450, WL 180, LBL 50) and disconnect the cap from connector D40823J.
Verify pins 1, 3, 5, 7, and 9 on connector D40823J are grounded.

note.para: Pins on connector D40823J (limit switch contacts), when grounded, verify the associated valves’ position as follows:

numlitem.para: Verify pins 2, 4, 6, 8, and 10 on connector D40823J are not grounded.

Access Pack 1 Dump Valve (V556) and Pack 3 Dump Valve (V557) through the air conditioning equipment bay access doors and visually verify BOTH valves are OPEN as shown by the valve’s position indicators.
Position the Fire control panel (P5) CARGO FIRE MAIN DECK switch to ARMED.
Verify pins 2, 4, 6, 8, and 10 on connector D40823J are grounded.
Verify pins 1, 3, 5, 7, and 9 on connector D40823J are not grounded.
Visually verify that the Pack 1 Dump Valve (V556) is CLOSED.
Visually verify that the Pack 3 Dump valve (V557) is OPEN.
Reconnect connector DV93 to the Pack 1 Flow Control Valve (V93).
Position the Bleed Air Control panel (P5) PACK 1 selector OFF and PACK 3 selector NORM.
Disconnect connector DV95 from Pack 3 Control Valve (V95).
Visually verify that the Pack 1 Dump Valve (V556) is OPEN.
Visually verify that the Pack 3 Dump Valve (V557) is CLOSED.
Reconnect connector DV95 to the Pack 3 Flow Control Valve (V95).
Position the Bleed Air Control panel (P5) PACK 3 selector OFF.
Position the Fire Control panel (P5) CARGO FIRE MAIN DECK switch OFF.
Verify pins 1, 3, 5, 7, and 9 on connector D40823J are grounded.
Verify pins 2, 4, 6, 8, and 10 on connector D40823J are not grounded.
Reconnect the cap to connector D40823J at the L-MAIN EQPT/E1-1 THROUGH E1-6 disconnect panel number AEO411.
